name: Easy Cuban Salad
author: Bibi
summary: This refreshing salad relies on a few ingredients and the addition of a brightly flavored citrus dressing.
ingredients: ½ cup extra virgin olive oil
1 head romaine lettuce - rinsed, dried and chopped
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, lime juice, minced garlic, salt, and pepper in a 1-pint container or jar with tight-fitting lid
Tightly close the lid and shake until the ingredients are well blended
Refrigerate until ready to toss with the salad, or up to 3 days
Combine chopped romaine, tomato wedges, sliced radishes, sliced red onion, and chopped avocado in a large bowl
Add as much dressing as you like, and toss all ingredients
Serve dressed, tossed salads on individual salad plates
